meanings.definition: Represents or embodies (a quality or concept) in human form.
meanings.sent1: The superhero in the movie personifies bravery and courage.
meanings.sent2: The statue personifies wisdom and knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog in the cartoon personifies silliness and fun.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the garden personifies strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The painting vividly personifies love and passion.

meanings.definition: Represents or embodies (a quality or concept) in a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The antique mirror personifies elegance and beauty.
meanings.sent2: The old house personifies history and tradition.
meanings.sent3: The quirky clock on the wall personifies creativity and uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: The ancient book personifies knowledge and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The unique sculpture personifies art and imagination.
